name: Supernode
slogan: Global community driving innovation in media and technology
description:
Supernode is a new and the first global professional community connecting builders, funders, buyers, and partners who are driving innovation at the intersection of media and technology. Our mission is to help build and grow the world’s most significant media-tech companies. 

Supernode is spearheaded by Rooks Nest Ventures, an early stage VC investing in media-tech companies globally.

team.title: Managing Director
team.name: Gina King
team.bioHtml: 20+ years of commercial + entrepreneurial experience building B2B and B2C businesses; early stage investor; community builder

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
**About Supernode **

Supernode is a new and the first global professional community connecting builders, funders, buyers, and partners who are shaping the future of media technology. Our mission is to help build and grow the world’s most significant media and technology companies. Supernode is spearheaded by Rooks Nest Ventures, an early-stage VC investing in media-tech companies globally.

**The Role**

The Marketing Manager will be responsible for strategic and tactical execution across all marketing activities including content strategy, social media marketing, digital marketing, PR, and events. In addition, you will provide ad hoc marketing support to RNV portfolio companies as well as members of Supernode to help fulfil their marketing goals. 

**Responsibilities will include:**

* Execute our brand and marketing strategy including developing content, organising our editorial calendar, and managing our website, social, and PR activities
* Develop a strong social strategy and coordinate a regular posting schedule to reach and engage our target audience across multiple channels
* Help to formulate and execute strategies to increase brand awareness and drive engagement 
* Write copy for the website, online platform, social media, and email campaigns 
* Organise and promote differentiated, compelling events for Supernode members
* Identify and secure speaking opportunities at relevant industry events
* Measure and communicate marketing performance across channels
* Design and produce marketing collateral and manage all brand assets
* Support RNV portfolio of companies through ad hoc marketing support
* Assist with managing our PR firm and supporting media relations activities 

**Qualities we’re looking for:**

* 3+ years of experience in content marketing, brand marketing and/or social media marketing 
* Experience with organising, marketing, and hosting events
* Knowledge of the startup ecosystem and venture capital 
* Proven track record of building an audience and driving engagement
* Tactical and execution-oriented with a strategic mindset
* High attention to detail and ability to manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneously
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Strong analytical skills and a desire to measure the impact of your work
* A team player, who is also happy to work independently 
* A doer with drive and ambition to get things done and see results
* An innately creative thinker
* Strong EQ and stakeholder management capabilities

Our mission is to help build and grow the world’s most significant media and technology companies. The Role

The Marketing Manager will be responsible for strategic and tactical execution across all marketing activities including content strategy, social media marketing, digital marketing, PR, and events. In addition, you will provide ad hoc marketing support to RNV portfolio companies as well as members of Supernode to help fulfil their marketing goals.

Responsibilities will include:

  • Develop a strong social strategy and coordinate a regular posting schedule to reach and engage our target audience across multiple channels
  • Help to formulate and execute strategies to increase brand awareness and drive engagement

  • Organise and promote differentiated, compelling events for Supernode members
  • Identify and secure speaking opportunities at relevant industry events
